chapters.title: Chapter 4: Leaving the Tower
chapters.info: Sarene Nemdahl, p. 75—Accepted from Tarabon. She is the most beautiful woman in the Accepted's quarters, with the possible exception of Ellid, though she seems blissfully unaware of this. She has very little tact for a sheepherder's daughter, and a sharp tongue. She is often unaware when she says something wrong. She and Moiraine are friends.
